short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AWS Hero is a browser extension that helps organise your AWS account panel and enhance account visibility.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is AWS Hero?
AWS Hero is your dedicated buddy designed to transform your AWS portal and console experience. Crafted out of necessity - fuelled by frustration - this extension is here to solve common pain points for anyone juggling multiple AWS accounts and environments.

Why You Need AWS Hero:
- Custom account names to suit your naming conventions.
- Easily categorise accounts by assigning available types - supports: Production, Staging, Development, and Sandbox.
- Collapsible colour strip in the AWS console to instantly identify accounts.
- Dark mode (AWS Access Portal) for comfortable experience during those late-night sessions.
